description: Main Dart source file for a Flutter audiobook store app, containing widget definitions, data models, and UI components including main app setup, navigation, mock data, and bookstore grid layout.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that sets up theme and home screen.

classes.name: Audiobook
classes.description: Data model representing an audiobook with title, author, image URL, and price.

classes.name: AudiobookMainScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget with bottom navigation managing different views.

classes.name: StoreView
classes.description: Widget displaying grid of audiobooks in the store.

classes.name: AudiobookGridTile
classes.description: Widget for individual audiobooks in the grid, showing image, title, author, and price.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the MyApp widget.
